Utilities Module¶

Common utility functions used across the ML Core modules.

Safe division with zero denominator handling.

  • b (denominator)

Return type:

ML_Engine.utils.logger module¶

Logger Configuration¶

Configures a central logger for the ML_Engine library.

Get a configured logger instance.

Parameters:

  • level (int, default=logging.INFO) – The logging level (e.g., logging.INFO, logging.DEBUG).

Returns:

A configured logger instance.
